statements: SELECT * FROM jokes
SELECT id, joke_text, writer_name FROM jokes ORDER BY submission_date DESC
SELECT writer_name, joke_text FROM jokes WHERE id = 3
SELECT joke_text, submission_date FROM jokes WHERE writer_name = 'John Smith'
SELECT id, writer_name FROM jokes ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM jokes WHERE writer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, joke_text FROM jokes WHERE submission_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, writer_name, submission_date FROM jokes ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT joke_text FROM jokes WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT writer_name, COUNT(*) AS joke_count FROM jokes GROUP BY writer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM jokes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT joke_text, author FROM jokes WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT author, likes FROM jokes ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM ideas WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT idea_text FROM ideas WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM jokes ORDER BY likes DESC, author ASC;
SELECT id, joke_text, author FROM jokes WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, idea_text, author, category FROM ideas WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM jokes JOIN ideas ON jokes.author = ideas.author WHERE jokes.likes > 50;
SELECT author, category, COUNT(*) FROM ideas GROUP BY author, category ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM Writer;
SELECT writer_name FROM Writer WHERE writer_id = 1;
SELECT joke_text FROM Jokes ORDER BY joke_id DESC;
SELECT idea_description, writer_id FROM Ideas WHERE writer_id = 5;
SELECT writer_name FROM Writer WHERE writer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT writer_name, joke_text FROM Writer JOIN Jokes ON Writer.writer_id = Jokes.writer_id WHERE Jokes.joke_id = 1;
SELECT writer_name, joke_text, idea_description FROM Writer JOIN Jokes ON Writer.writer_id = Jokes.writer_id JOIN Ideas ON Writer.writer_id = Ideas.writer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT writer_name FROM Writer JOIN Jokes ON Writer.writer_id = Jokes.writer_id WHERE Jokes.joke_text LIKE '%funny%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_jokes FROM Writer JOIN Jokes ON Writer.writer_id = Jokes.writer_id WHERE Writer.writer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT writer_name, idea_description FROM Ideas JOIN Writer ON Ideas.writer_id = Writer.writer_id WHERE Idea.idea_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Writers WHERE writer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, joke_content, author_name FROM Jokes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT writer_name, writer_email FROM Writers WHERE writer_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT idea_description, author_name FROM Ideas WHERE author_name = 'Alice Smith' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT joke_content, author_name FROM Jokes JOIN Collaboration ON Jokes.id = Collaboration.joke_id WHERE Collaboration.idea_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Jokes
SELECT id, joke_content FROM Jokes WHERE author_name='John Doe'
SELECT writer_name, writer_email FROM Writers ORDER BY writer_name DESC
SELECT j.joke_content, i.idea_description FROM Jokes j INNER JOIN Ideas i ON j.id = i.id
SELECT j.joke_content, i.idea_description FROM Jokes j LEFT JOIN Ideas i ON j.id = i.id
SELECT * FROM jokes;
SELECT joke_text, author_name FROM jokes WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT creator_name, idea_description FROM joke_ideas ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT joke_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM joke_ratings GROUP BY joke_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
SELECT category_name FROM joke_categories WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM joke_ideas WHERE creator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT idea_description, date_created FROM joke_ideas ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT j.joke_text, jr.rating, jr.rater_name FROM jokes j JOIN joke_ratings jr ON j.id = jr.joke_id WHERE jr.rating > 4;
SELECT jc.category_name, COUNT(jc.id) as total_jokes FROM joke_categories jc JOIN jokes j ON jc.id = j.id GROUP BY jc.category_name;

SELECT jc.category_name, AVG(jr.rating) as avg_rating FROM joke_categories jc JOIN jokes j ON jc.id = j.id JOIN joke_ratings jr ON j.id = jr.joke_id GROUP BY jc.category_name HAVING AVG(jr.rating) > 3;
